definitions.text: (baseball) the person who does the pitching
examples: our pitcher has a sore arm

definitions.text: an open vessel with a handle and a spout for pouring
the quantity contained in a pitcher
(botany) a leaf that that is modified in such a way as to resemble a pitcher or ewer
the position on a baseball team of the player who throws the ball for a batter to try to hit
examples: he has played every position except pitcher
they have a southpaw on the mound
